poem:
Title: "Awakening in The Land of the Rising Sun"

The kimono loosened, Japan
in smoking contemplation stirs,
from languid slumber wakes.
No longer do negative yields chain,
but a growth-kissed dawn breaks.
Eight years afloat on yielding waves,
now poised on the bow of hope,
the fiscal boat bravely sails,
the cerulean ocean of economy gently sways;
A first entrusting gust trails,
Japan, in fiscal bloom, hails.
